reviews.review: Это просто необычный хоррор. Играя в нее ты прям чувствуешь себя за место героя за которого играешь. Завораживающие моменты,а так же очень интересные маньяки. Советую купить эту игру не пожалеете,
No está nada mal, aunque he de decir que puede cansar bastante rápido sino juegas con amigos.

хоть и рекомендую, но дерьмовые танцы с выжившими, которые играют по голосовой или еще хуже, с читами, превращаются для маньяка, за которого я больше люблю играть, в идиотизм: они знают о тебе все, а ты даже порой с этой темной гаммой даже в упор иногда никого не видишь, т.к. все темно сильно. баланс нулевый, выигрываешь только тогда, когда соперник тупит безбожно, в иных случаях выиграть нереально.
прокачка по рангам сильно быстрая, слишком быстро попадаешь на киберкотлет +/- со связью. да даже раздражают типы, играющие 900ч, когда у тебя того меньше. 
дисбаланс на дисбалансе.
игры за маньяков ищутся долго, даже очень
one of the best games i have. now its updated and you can play with your friends fantastic

Unique Game, Unique Mechanics. Get ready to have your pulse rocked! Amazing game, some bugs and glitches, the devs appear to be good people and it looks like they are in it for the long run. Play as a survivor in a team of 4 or chase down the survivors in the role of a mass-murderer. Two different playstyles and just tons of fun!


Only reason they get a recommend from me is purely because the game is so unique.
Matchmaking is fixed!

Sincerely, Dizturbed
很棒的一款游戏，游戏中的音乐是一大亮点，如果你想体验刺激的感觉，可以来试一试这款游戏。

100% Not reccomended.  Game has multiple exploits and broken bugs that ruin gameplay for both sides of Killers and Survivors.  Cheaters are nearing half of the userbase, and the Dev team is so blindly optimistic that people will just become mannered and play fair.   Mods are apologetic defenders of all cheaters, if I could get a refund for this game I would.

No one buy this, its a broken and failed project.


Edit:  I noticed that the Devs and mods are going around thumbing down every negative review, that should be steam punishable.

update for new patch:  Bugs still MASSIVE, partially fixed the infinite juke, but they have no cheat detection software for the game.  Over 1/3 of the Killers will throttle their internet speed to cheat survivors, and map hacking is abudent.  You can even add the Killers who cheat after the game, and they laugh at the zero consequences the Devs announced will happen.

STILL a failed project.
Очень интересная и захватывающая игра. Приятно поиграть с друзьями. Не жалко таких денег

Um Ehrlich zu sein ... Das Spiel "wäre" Gut wenn die Entwickler sich mal ranhalten würden und einfach mal viele wirklich viele Hotfixes und vor allem Patches rausbringen würden.
An sich macht das Spiel spaß .... sobald man aber in höhere Ranglistenspiele kommt kannst  du das Spiel vor allem als Killer in die Tonne treten. Da es auf jeder möglichen Karte einfach Plätze gibt an denen sich die Überlebenden sofort ohne irgendwie nach zudenken in Sicherheit bringen. Man hätte ja kein Problem wenn man als Killer sie dort irgendwie fangen könnte ... aber das ist einfach unmöglich. Der Punkt ist einfach dieser, dass die meisten Überlebenden in höheren Rangplätzen sich diese nicht verdienen sondern immer und immer wieder diese Plätze auf jeder Karte ausnutzen bis zum brechen. Dadurch macht es als Killer zum Beispiel einfach keinen Spaß mehr, da es einfach nur Nerven aufreibt.
Das Spiel steckt im Prinzip noch in den Kinderschuhen. Es braucht noch einiges damit man es wirklich als ein Komplettes Spiel ansehen kann. Ich bin mir ziemlich sicher das dass Spiel nur deswegen so früh veröffentlicht wurde aus Angst vor der kommenden Konkurenz.

Fazit: Als Überlebender am Anfang noch wenigstens Horror aber später gewöhnt man sich 
                                      daran und dann ist es viel zu einfach.
         Als Killer am Anfang noch ein Spaß und später einfach nur zum überkochen nervig

Mit freundlichen Grüßen R33gy
Хорошая игра)

Está lleno de bugs y errores. Le falta mucho por pulir.
Y encima hay que pagar por cada contenido que van añadiendo al juego y me parece un saca dinero del horror,
10 капканов из 10 !
很多作弊者,游戏体验很差,监控力度小，举报途径困难，不建议购买

No one wants to play Killer anymore because Survivors are OP, devs aren't adding to the game - merely bending over to submit to the demands of the toxic, whiny, obnoxious community members as they demanded that they could play with their friends so that they could overpower Killers with voice communication. If their demands weren't met? They'd continue to sabotage the games' pub servers for those who were okay with playing with strangers.

Many people ragequit because they were first to be caught by killer
Many of these people scream about how unfair it was that they were caught first
Many of these people will cry foul that a killer decides to camp a meathook to ensure the first survivor dies, with hopes the other survivors don't start the generators while he waits and lets the first survivor bleed to death on the meat hook.

These babies cry foul because killers use strategies, they became so pampered with their self-absorbed ideology that they would think to themselves in the right no matter what, and that they'd deliberately try to 'Avoid' or leave games that happens to have Killers who Camp. You cannot argue with these kids, they'll tell you "camping isn't a strategy" no matter how much logic you use.

Don't be like me, buying the game cause you love playing as a Killer, love the feeling of being a predator, of Cat and Mouse hunting. These devs made a repetitive, empty game, full of whining, narcissistic children who sabotage servers and the devs bent over and submitted to them. Best if you don't buy the game unless the developers actually fix and make the game less repetitive, less empty, and where the game modes aren't so severely leaned towards Survivors being a cake-walk to win. Survivors who're this self-absorbed are the WORST to play with as they will use every cheap tactic to win, and when I say cheap, don't think 'Camper' cheap, but much worse. If you Main Killer, you'll see what I mean, but I'll vaguely tell you what survivor-exploitations happen the most.

Window-Hoppers - and - Barricade-Hoppers.

If you main Killer, you will hate these people, as they will make it impossible to win. They'll also cry that it's 'Legit' or that if you claim camping as killer is a Legit strategy, then so is window hopping. The difference? There's areas on the maps that make it so if a survivor camps by a window, you, as a killer? Cannot catch them, cannot hit them, cannot kill them. They can wait it out until you leave or literally quit the game.

Take my word with a heavy grain of salt, I became Killer Rank 1, playing a LOT OF MATCHES, so I've played against every variety of 'Survivor' you can name. Skilled, unskilled, Ragequitters, or just plain ole' obnoxious. The achievement of obtaining Killer Rank 1 has gotten into a lower percentage just by how much harder it is to win as Killer.

TL;DR - Avoid this game unless the developers actually ADD something to it. It's empty, and full of toxic children who're incredibly cancerous. I told one of them to kill themselves because of how toxic they were on the forums and got insta PERM banned too. Was pretty funny.

[Edit] - After the ban, I sometimes re-look at the forum to see if anything has changed - but evidence still shows that most of the community members are completely selfish and they don't care about how much fun the killer is having, they only care about winning and making it so the killer can't win so they can stroke themselves off at an Ezwin, that is only possible because they sabotaged the servers enough until the devs buckled under the complaints.

I expect many to object or criticize this review, if any of those who do leave a comment happen to be one of the 'Cancerous' community members who have no shred of logic, I will be instantly blocking. I argued and tried my hardest to persuade and convince these kids that what they were doing was unhealthy, was bad, and was selfish, they merely attacked me endlessly for it. I have no patience for the cancer that is within this community, so I made this novel of a review to explain my story, to avoid this game, avoid the cancerous community, and for the love of god, if you love the concept of playing as a Killer? Don't TRY it in this game. It has its highs and lows, but mostly Lows.
一直闪退官方都不修复

Now before you start reading into all the reviews with the "bugs" and the "exploiting" and the "my internet wasn't feeling well" and the "git guds", let me just remind you really super duper quickly that this game is only $20.
For $20, you get endless replayability mashed together with an actually meaningful progression system! (even if you don't get the perk you wanted while leveling, you probably got a couple great items and some other miscellaneous goodies to keep you happy AND help you keep leveling.)
For $20, you get to be one of 3 (4th coming soon) INDESTRUCTIBLE monsters each with their own gruesome and tastefully cliche weapon. (Bear traps, chainsaws, and cloaking, ohh my!)
For $20, you get to panic with the utmost of terror as your own heart pounds louder and louder, alerting you to the killer beside you with his blade raised high, screaming obsceneties about a spider god.
For that same $20, you can drop a steaming load all over your survivor teammates by leading the killer directly to them! It's totally encouraged, just check out the opening trailer. ;)

Recent edit due to reasons: As of right now, in it's current state, this game is practically unplayable. Between infinite loading screens and constant lobby dodging, you'll be lucky to play 2 games in the same hour. Even further, the community has errupted into toxicity; face camping is rampant, endgame chat logs are lolsy, and by god I'll be damned if any of it changes in the next few months.

This game really needs a single player practice mode to help one getting familiar around the generator QTE, escape route etc.. Great game, not friendly to new guys though.

Best game and most fun game i've played in a while
You can grind this game out and it doesn't get borring like people think

Наиграв 100 часов,я решил что имею право написать обзорчик на этот недоведенный до ума пока что шедевр.
Спорить с тем что игра оригинальная в своей атмосфере и в жанре думаю не имеет никакого смысла,так что этот вопрос даже не поднимался.
Купил,скачал,установил и наиграл 100 часов и наиграю наверное еще часов 500,потому что пекари рубят фишку и завлекли меня своей оригинальностью и атмосферой.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что значит,когда ты чинишь геник и в ожиданий мини-игры,не можешь почесать нос,а он сука всегда начинает у меня чесаться именно тогда,когда начинаю трогать геник.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что светить фонариком в ипало маньяка,также бессмысленно,как и стараться слезть с крюка.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет,что убегая от пилы по прямой,ты дал согласие на анальное сношение с ним.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что убегая в топ-манс от Траппера,ты даешь согласие на анальное сношение с ним.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что чиня геник при звуке сердцебиения,пытаясь спрятаться и пропустив скилл-чек,ты становишься посмертным героем-механиком,и твоя рандомная тима аутистов будут  помнить твой героический поступок 5 сек.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет всю боль предательства,когда ты целый слот перка занял перком "WELL MAKE IT",чтобы заниматься аутизмом, после того как сняв с крюка тимейта и подставившись под удар, тебя в итоге открыв двери бросает вся тима,и посрать что тебя не кемперил маня.
Игра пока очень багнутая и она приносит своими багами очень много боли и страданий,будем надеяться что разрабы доведут ее до ума,и когда-нибудь,в недалеком будущем выйдет патч, который исправит все баги,не завозя новые, будем оптимистами,и с надеждной и трепетом будем ждать этот волшебный патч!!!!

Игра очень интересная и весёлая! Всем советую. Она стоит своих денег.
Игра крутая,но у меня проблемы.Лагает,графика говно мне не понравилось я бы не советовал бы если у вас лабый комп.

Слишком много багов. Могу перечислить те, которые я, самолично наблюдала:
 1. Застревание в текстурах
 2.Крюки- убийцы: Захотел спасти тиммейта с крюка - убил его (у него было 5-10% здоровья)
 3. Проваливание под текстуры
 4.Телепортация (и тех и других). Причём чаще всего лагают Вижившие, и не ОТ маньяка, а К нему (С маньяками редко такое случается, но всё же бывает. Чаще в минус выжившим..)
 5. Двойные скилчеки. Перестаешь чинить генератор, а он бахает два раза подряд
 6. Маньяк кладёт полумёртвого выжившего на плечо, а выживший оказывается не на плече, а где то в метре (или двух) от него, вверх тормашками и в форме буквы "Г"
 7.Невидимые текстуры. Не видно стен, забора, домов (Одни генераторы да земля-матушка :) ) Со временем конечно прогружается, но всё же...
 8. Ищеш лобби, кто то лобби распустил. Возращаешся к меню персонажа и видешь не одного, а двух как две капли воды героев, застрявших друг в друге (Один чуть больше)
 9. Когда игра начинается, есть шанс того что выживший станет невидим (может даже двое станут невидимыми), виден лишь предмет в их руках (Поверьте, это очень читерно)
 10.Сбрасывание рейтинга. Набил ты себе 19-ый рейтинг, а завтра у тебя опять будет 20-ый (НЕНАВИЖУ ЭТО)

Матч-мейтин (Поиск игры):
Его нет. Его просто нет. Если ты с 19-ым рейтингом (18-ым) Тебя забросит к  14-13 рейтингу, с фиольными (розовыми) перками, с офигенными аддонами и подношениями (Поверьте, я из- за этого не могу себе рейтинг поднять выше 19-ого)ъ
А неопытного маньяка закидывает к продвинутым выжившим, и он им ничего не может сделать!
Это очень жутко бесит. Пожалуйста, исправте.

Маньяки:
Тут всё просто. Перки слишком сильные, а подношение снятся в кошмарах у выживших.
  Короче. Маньяковые перки надо урезать, у выживших чучуть улучшить (не ухудшить!) т.к. Неопытным игрокам играющим за выживших против таких, с такими перками сложно играть (Запомните: Вы сами отгоняете покупателей от своей продукции)

 Читеры:
Знаете.. Нафиг я объясняю, когда вы увидите телепортирующегося маньяка, который видит через стены и убивает с одного удара, тогда поймёте.
А выжившие не лучше: чинить генератор за 2 секунды, бегать без следов и шума, не превлекать ворон...
 Ах да, ещё эти гады которые что-то делают (Чаще маньяки) а потом у выживших (Маньяка) лагает так, что мама не горюй, легче просто выйти из игры.

 Поверте - бесит это всех, в том числе меня.


Всё выше перечисленное бесит немало игроков, некоторые даже бросают игру. Так что, от лица всех, кого бесят эти баги говорю:
    "FIX IT!" "ИСПРАВТЕ ЭТО!"

Игруля занятная, но одному играть в неё - только если за маньяка.
Мне нравится геймплей за сторону Жертв, поэтому постоянно ищу с кем играть в команде =)

Игра классная, стоит своих денег. Интересно иногда отвлечься зайти поиграть в нее. Но иногда раздражают подвисания и застревания в текстурах.

非常棒的游戏，希望出汉化会更好

19, July, 2016
Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer, competitive, survival, horror game which typically is played as a 1v4, 1v3, 1v2 or 1v1.

The setting is in some sort of abandoned park, or field, etc (different maps) at night where 1-4 survivors are trapped and must attempt to escape. The reason why they must escape is because lurking in the area with them is a demonic, cold-blooded serial-killer. The killer who is controlled by 1 player in the match must kill/sacrifice as many survivors as possible. Sounds like a pretty straight-forward matchup. However it is not as easy as it seems.

In each map there are 2 main exits which are closed and dysfunctional, as well as around 7 stationary generators spread around the area. In order the power the main exists, the survivors must repair a certain number generators (typically depending on the amount of survivors in the match (4 survivors = 5 generators. 3 survivors = 4 generators. etc)) Each generator takes a vaguely large amount of time to repair and while survivors are repairing them they are constantly under the heart-pounding pressure of encountering the killer.

The killer's job isn't entirely simple either. When the killer finds a survivor he must strike them (generally twice) with their primary weapon in order to seize them from running and down them. From there the killer cannot physically kill the survivors (unless a certain "perk" is used). His job is to pick them up and hang them on sacrificial hooks spread around the map. The hooks keep the survivors stationary and sets a long time limit where a spider-like, speared creature (best description I can give) forms around the hook post and attempts to kill the survivor. The survivors can be saved while hung up though. 

At this point in time (July 19, 2016) the killer player can select 1 of 3 different killers, each with a different ability. One carries around beartraps which can be set anywhere and seize wandering survivors. One has a cloaking bell which can turn the killer mostly invisible. And also one with a chainsaw that can be used to charge at and completely down any survivors that make contact.

The game as well as being challenging includes many more mechanics and features than it appears. When performing tasks such as repairing generators or healing teammates, the game randomly displays 'skill checks' in order the make the tasks more pressuring and challenging. Upon failing a skill check, the completion bar will move down slightly and will also causes a very audible sound, potentially attracting the killer. Upon succeeding a skill check, the bar moves skips a few seconds and rewards the player extra game points. There are also storage crates around the map which contain useful items for survivors such as medkits for assisting in healing other survivors or yourself, toolboxes for assisting in repairing generators or sabotaging hooks and other mechanical objects, or a flashlight which can be used to blind and stun the killer when necessary.

There are many ways for survivors to counter the killer's wrath including vaulting over slightly raised objects or windows, pushing down barricades in front of him and potentially stunning them, blinding them with the flashlight, hiding in cabinets, or planting themselves in camouflaged positions in order the lure the killer away.

There are many other mechanics in-game which I would love to talk about but need to keep this review not as long. The game also has a ranking system used to truly compete with other players and become more skilled at the game. There are also a variety of customization options, items, perks and add-ons for the characters and killers.

The game at this point in time isn't perfect, as there are many bugs and in-game features which make the game less fun and more frustrating at times. However, what we have right now is a creative, fun and interactive competitive game that tests and rewards the player's ability to remain vigilant, keep focused, be stealthy, stay alert, and be altruistic and supportive to your fellow survivors. And always remember that "death is not an escape"

Pros:
- Incredible variety of mechanics
- Intriguing gameplay
- Audio gives players paranoia
- Overwhelmingly terrifying moments
- Greatly tests player's gameplay abilities
- Variety of customization and add-ons
- Enjoyable when played with friends
- Potential epic and satisfying moments

Cons:
- Some frustrating mechanics and features
- Confusing ranking system
- Non reusable items and perks
- Over-powered favouring to quickly skilled players
- Glitches (July 19, 2016)
- Not a lot the game has to offer (July 19, 2016)
- Poorly optimized (July 19, 2016)

7/10
Recommended for players interested in multiplayer, survival horror, strategy, and competitive gameplay.

Игра супер. 1-ое что меня впечатлило, так это реалистичная графика, хоть игрушка-та стоит 400 руб. 2-ое то-что эта игра не просто чтоб побегать, там, или убить, а чтоб ещё и прокачивать персов. Есть перки у них уровни, то есть самый большой перк 3-его уровня, то есть он улучшенный, есть подношения, это очень классно, еще предметы и на них аддоны. Что нравится, если остаёшься один в команде, то есть запасной выход, это люк, просто супер. Есть много тактик, так чтоб спасти, так чтоб и убить. В игре меня бесит только одно и это не игра бесит, а люди, т.е маньяк, бесят маньяки которые просто кемперят людей,вот как бесит, но я easy все равно спасаю. Кароч, хочу сказать, эти 400 рублей оторвали меня от cs:go  и я не шучу. За эти деньги игра самая, самая лучшая. Что мне ещё нравиться можно просто поиграть с друзьями в Party. И еще недавно  добавили режим play with friend, режим супер,т.е ты не будешь как раньше с друзьями на раз, два, три заходить, а просто создаешь, приглашаешь и ищешь лобби. Самая лучшая игра. Даже в GTA 5 не тянет.

Удивительные ощущения от игры - интерес , атмосфера, страх, паника  ! В стиле фильмов "Пятница 13 -ое". Симулятор пряток и догонялок от Маньяка , так же можно играть за самого убийцу - крамсать мачете своих друзей и не знакомых личностей, это незабываемо ! Can be fun when its not being broken as all hell.

Should never have been released as a normal game but early access instead due it feeling like a Beta in every area.

* Matchmaking is wonkey at best - Between the "Failed to join game" to not putting similar level survivors together or against a killer of similar level
* Most killers only play the Wraith from my plays
* Get stuck on terrain for no good reason often enough to be fairly annoying (especially that mound on the estate)
* Game forgets your trying to disarm a trap and lets you unhook someone instead leading to them or you getting trapped
* getting downed on a window while vaulting gets you stuck in a situation you cant be saved or hooked
* Game has devolved into a point farming game rather than one of a struggle for survival

So your asking why a positive rating with all these complaints? (and I could add more)

Simple. Its fun with friends. When points are taken out of the mix and you know people wont take advantage of glitches it becomes a much more fun experience. But still remember this is very very beta still and really the developers should have marked it as such (I am kind of disappointed with the devs for this) I am just making sure people buy knowing this fact.

I have over 1000 hours played in this game. Recent changes have made it terrible for beginners, and bad for everyone.

1. Changes to the perk distribution system - Now players get the more common perks instead of rare and very rare perks when they level. That doesn't hurt me, but if you are just starting out, you're going to have an ever increasing collection of the worst perks in the game as you level up to 50. I have a ~40 survivor that I leveled under the new perk system. One rare perk (specific to that survivor, so I get this one no matter what), one common perk, and 15+ uncommon perks. All of them junk.

2. You still directly connect to another player's PC (the killer) - The person playing killer can unplug their ethernet cable and quickly plug it back in. This will disconnect survivors. If you are disconnected in this manner as a survivor, you get ZERO points. You likely just wasted 10-15 minutes of playtime for nothing. On the other hand, the killer will get all of the points they earned so far, plus 1250 per survivor that gets disconnected (a "quitter" bonus).

3. Unlike most multiplayer games out there, DbD doesn't show you your connection speed to the killer - There's no ping indicator and the game doesn't have a region lock. You'll want to play with people on your continent and end up with someone half way around the world. And this isn't by accident. A player from China can set their region to somewhere in North America, and you'll get connected to them, lag and all.

4. Stagnant playstyle - There are six killers in the game, but the majority of your matches as survivor will only be against two of them, the Trapper and the Shape. The remaining four are either too weak (the Wraith and the Hag), or have too much of a learning curve (the Hillbilly and the Nurse).

It was fun, a lot of fun, at one time. Not so much any more.

建议取消段位，或者让人类的分数以团队为基础（占百分之八十），个人表现分数为辅（百分之二十），4个人一起逃基础分数很高，一个人逃走了基础分低，比如你一直和屠夫绕，最后被他杀死，个人分很低，但由于你牵制了屠夫，队友跑了3个，你的团队分就高。

'Pique esconde com o Jason' é assim que eu definiria esse jogo, nele você pode jogar como um sobrevivente(survivor) ou como o assassino(killer). Você tem que se esconder do assassino enquanto completa objetivos para vencer a partida(fugir do mapa) ou matar os sobreviventes se estiver jogando como o assassino antes que eles fujam.

O jogo é bastante novo e é bem provavel que você vai passar raiva por causa de algum bug/lag/camper, mas se você se acostumar com isso vai ver que é um excelente jogo, principalmente agora que você pode jogar com seus amigos.

I'm a developer... and I usually understand that shit happens after deployment, I can understand  that the devs on this game are actually a small team of friends... I could even understand that the devs may have a life and a regular job that regularly brings food to their tables... I can understand a lot of things related to development and release cycles.

What I can't understand is how they can leave a game in this state for so long... This game is one of the best sellers of the last few weeks... so the cashflow is there. Forums are crowded of bug reports, so they know what's happening.

How in heavens they can allow their users to keep clicking 20, 30, 50 times... to finally get into a lobby. If they're lucky, the lobby actually turns into a game (otherwise you're sent back to the Join Lobby/Failed to Join Game game...)

Thus, because you're new to the game... and even not that new, you'll probably die very soon and will need to start over again.

That is an insult, a fraud, a slap in our faces.

I'm not asking them to fix the balance between survivors and the killer, I'm not asking them to fix the terrible matchmaking process,.. Heck, i'm not asking them to fix the infinite loop bug or adding new maps or a new killer.

I'M JUST ASKING THEM TO FIX THE DAMN LOBBY! IS IT TOO HARD TO IMPLEMENT AT LEAST A VERY SIMPLE QUEUE?

This only has ONE explanation: They don't give a shit for their users.

I wish I could ask a refund.

[RUS] - Русский:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Добро пожаловать, это мой обзор и чисто мое мнение об этой игре. Начнем, с того, что игра очень интересна, но прокачка персонажа в игре занимает очень много времени. В игре присутствует огромное кол-во багов, из-за которых у вас будет бомбить. В игре есть такая категория - "Альтруизм", скажу честно, действия в этой категории приводят к смерти, если вы не играете в лобби из 4 человек и сидите между собой в любой голосовой программе. Большинство игроков поступают немного неправильно, нарушая смысл игры. Например, выжившие, бегают в мансовых места(бесконечный троллинг маньяка), некоторые маньяки подходят вплотную к жертве и не дают ее снять(блокируя действие), некоторые маньяки сидят вплотную к люку, не давая Вам сбежать. Разработчики говорили, что хотят это все как-то пофиксить, но пока это все на мертвой точке(исключение: мансовые места, их фиксят, но добавляют новые).
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Мой вывод: игра достойна своих денег, но ей не хватает собственных серверов, и многих баг фиксов.

On first glance this game looked like youtube-bait, yknow the kind of tacky horror game that streamers like to scream at?

It is not. it is a fantastic multiplayer game about second guessing your opponents.

as a survivor you are playing an incredibly tense stealth game where cooperation is shaky,  working together makes things much easier but going back to help your freinds is never ever an easy decision to make as it will often lead to death.

as a killer you have a several options, each character offers a suprisingly different playstyles, all of which offer different forms of mind-games to play against your foes. 

play this game!

the negative:  the game isnt without its faults.
There are lots of bugs and there are some exploits certain players will abuse, the dev team is supporting this game well and with time i'm sure these problems will go away, but currently you have to be willing to put up with this.

NOT RECOMMENDED 

Cons:
Offically released but at best at a early access stage.
Devs have literally done nothing. Released far too early and now they are currently in the process of adding in features that should have been in from day 1.
Lack of options/settings. No keybinding changes. (I mean seriously?). The resolution is a fucking slider for fucks sake WHO DOES THAT?
Survivors have to deal with laggy killers (purposely lagging their connection so survivors can barely move). 
Peer 2 peer connection instead of dedicated servers 
Riddled with countless bugs: For example, trapped in terrain, buggy user interface, bloodweb bugs, items bugs, you name it.
Quite a few hackers in the game now since the developers were stingy and didnt invest in some decent anticheat software.
Possible to lose all progress (happens rarely but gamebreaking nonetheless)
There is no Matchmaking system at this moment. If you start the game fresh, it is possible to play against Rank 1s or Level 50s or both.
Very difficult to find a game because the killer can pick who they want to play with since they get to see the survivors rank and level. They will "lobby hop" if they feel that the chance of them winning/ranking up is low.
Buggy Match finding, usually can't find a match or kicks you back out to menu screen. Almost impossible to find games with the "survive with friends mode".
Survive with friends does not have persistent match finding so everytime you fail to find a game it'll unready everyone and you have to wait 5 seconds again so you can't even alt-tab and do something else. Expect to find a single game every 15minutes only to find that the killer lobby hops because he doesn't want to play against a premade team.
Developers clearly do not play their own game often since they have no intention of balancing perks/hook camping etc etc.
Very unlikely to find good games. You'll manage to get into a game 2/10 times when you press ready, you then have a 5/10 chance that the killer will dodge the game, then you'll have a 5/10 chance you'll be matched with veteran killers/survivors. Then there is a 1/10 chance you'll meet a ESP hacker or you'll find a killer who will hook camp survivors until they die or the killer that ragequits early. So you have a grand total of <1% chance of finding a good game.
At high ranks, due to broken perks, no one helps each other because it is far too unlikely to successfully rescue someone as survivors when they are caught. Killers have huge problems when survivors are really fast at fixing generators.
Moderators like to ban/lock threads that directly criticises the game so be careful of what you say.
Community is slowly becoming more toxic as these issues persists.
Overpowered perks for killers as well as for survivors.
Killers have to deal with window cheesers.
Horrible grind for levels. If you're not prepared to play 300+ hours on this game, do not expect to get the best perks, add-ons, offerings for both killers and survivors. It takes about 50+ hours to get one character to level 50...There are 7 characters.
No diversity due to overpowered perks.
Some map are completely broken for survivors, i.e. autohaven maps and some maps are completely broken for killers, i.e. sheltered woods.


Pros: 
Excellent concept. Potentially the best gameplay for this type of genre.

Conclusion:
Game has huge potential but the developers are making very amateurish mistakes. Don't expect many hotfixes/patches often, they work at a snail's pace. Heard rumours that this game is supposed to be competitive (e-sports maybe), but you cannot have a competitive game with perks as broken as the ones in the game. As it is now do NOT purchase this game. If you already have do NOT play more than 2 hours so you can atleast refund it until all of the issues above are addressed.
